intro: Discover other STEM actors, organizations, and STEM events on the MINTvernetzt community platform and get inspired for your work.
opportunities: Create profile pages for yourself, your organization, and create projects or events.

education.headline: Shaping education together
education.content: The nationwide STEM community thrives on <0>exchanging ideas, sharing knowledge, and learning from and with each other</0>. On the community platform, you can <0>network with each other and with organizations, and find inspiration or <1>experts</1></0> on specific topics in your area.

growth.headline: How our community grows
growth.join: Become part of our constantly growing STEM community.

more.headline: Learn more
more.content: The MINTvernetzt community platform is a project by MINTvernetzt, started in 2021 to sustainably strengthen the <0>STEM community nationwide</0>. Learn more about the projects of <0>MINTvernetzt, the service and contact point for STEM actors</0> on the MINTvernetzt website.
